backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with all entity types, status enums, and cross-linked data structures for memberships, publishing, releases, recordings, and artist development.
backend/migration.mo: Provides type-aligned migration logic where the upgrade function simply returns the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records referencing frontend files, components, and test IDs for upgrade-resilient linking functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files related to linking, permissions, dialogs, and detail pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables, colors, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React application root and main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the application's router and protected portal routes with nested pages and authentication gates.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Blocks access for non‑approved users and provides an approval request UI unless the user is an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Redirects unauthenticated users to the landing page and shows a sign‑in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button that manages Internet Identity login flow and clears cached queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal requiring new authenticated users to submit their profile before accessing the portal.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Displays an access‑denied message with guidance for contacting an administrator.
frontend/src/components/feedback/EmptySt: Reusable empty‑state component with optional icon and action button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBa: Shows a formatted error alert and converts certain backend errors into friendly messages.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Displays a skeleton‑based full‑screen loading placeholder.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top navigation header with branding, home navigation, and optional auth button.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortalLay: Defines the portal's page layout with a sidebar, navigation items, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/related/EditLink: Simple button component that triggers editing of related entity links.
frontend/src/components/related/EditRela: Modal dialog for selecting and saving related entity IDs with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/related/MultiSel: Provides a searchable multi-select list component with checkboxes and filtered options.
frontend/src/components/related/relatedR: Implements permission checks for editing records based on identity, admin status, and ownership.
frontend/src/components/related/RelatedR: Displays related record IDs with label resolution based on user role and caller entity data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches caller role and approval status using the actor and exposes user state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkableEntityOpti: Builds linkable entity option lists for admins or non-admins using normalized backend or caller entity data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, approvals, memberships, works, releases, and projects.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, service descriptions, and Internet Identity sign‑in flow redirecting to the portal.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminBoo: Explains and displays instructions for initializing the first admin account using a secret token.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminDas: Admin dashboard showing system-wide stats and recent items, with access control and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/portal/artists/Artist: Displays and manages a single artist development entry, including editable related links and permissions.
Lists artist development entries and provides an admin-only dialog to create new entries.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/ReleaseD: Displays release details, fetches and normalizes linked entities, and allows editing related records if user permissions allow.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/Releases: Lists all releases with admin‑only creation dialog, handling form submission and navigation to individual release pages.
frontend/src/pages/portal/memberships/Me: Shows membership profile details, supports editing profile fields and managing related entity links with permission checks.
Lists all membership profiles and provides an admin‑only dialog to create new member records.
frontend/src/pages/portal/publishing/Pub: Loads publishing work details, supports adding notes and editing linked entities, and enforces edit permissions.
Lists publishing works, allows admins to create new ones with validation for contributors and ownership splits.
frontend/src/pages/portal/recordings/Rec: Displays detailed recording project info, handles linkable entity editing, and normalizes related arrays.
Shows all recording projects and provides an admin dialog to create new projects with session data and status.
frontend/src/utils/arrays.ts: Provides safe array normalization utilities for handling undefined or legacy backend values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates ownership split arrays ensuring totals are within allowed percentage limits.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme styles, colors, animations, and enabling typography and container queries plugins.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION.md: Manual checklist describing how to verify post-upgrade related‑record linking across all entity detail pages for admin and non‑admin users.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, architectural notes, issues, and a list of implemented features for the Higgins Music platform. Contains metadata about modules like membership, publishing, label operations, and recordings.
